meanings.definition: A dull, heavy sound, such as that made by an object falling to the ground.
meanings.sent1: The thuds of the hammer hitting the nail echoed in the room.
meanings.sent2: I heard the thuds of footsteps approaching from a distance.
meanings.sent3: The thuds of the basketball hitting the rim repeatedly made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The thuds of the raindrops on the roof sounded like a drumbeat.
meanings.sent5: The thuds of the heavy books hitting the floor startled the cat.

meanings.definition: To make a dull, heavy sound, as of an object hitting the ground.
meanings.sent1: The door thuds shut behind him as he leaves the room.
meanings.sent2: The apples thud against the ground as they fall from the tree.
meanings.sent3: She thuds the pillow against the wall to fluff it up.
meanings.sent4: His heart thuds loudly in his chest as he waits for the results.
meanings.sent5: The waves thud against the shore in a rhythmic pattern.
